title: New: Regal Safari – R G L S F R
body: [Regal Safari](http://www.facebook.com/regalsafari)’s first single, _Light_, was a carefree delight, amongst the blissfully free spirited tones however, was a level of intricacy that gave the tune an exciting level of depth. He’s just released a debut EP, entitled R G L S F R, and it continues in that delightful vein. Synth tones glare and pop amongst glisteningly soulful vocal arrangements, Safari is very much an artist that can smother you in a groove. I am willing to be smothered. Stream and DL the record below. R G L S F R by Regal Safari
